1.0.name: wordpress/kiss-url
1.0.description:
Automatically generates bit.ly shortlink for every posts, pages, category, archives etc. To get started, you'll need a free bit.ly user account and apiKey. Signup at: http://bit.ly/a/sign_up.

After activating the plugin go to Settings->KISS URL enter your bit.ly username and apiKey and save.

Plugin by http://www.revood.com
